idea-plugin.name: MILiveTemplates
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin for ReactNative with Live Template.
With MILiveTemplates plugin, user can find the following live templates while integrating the app in ReactNative.

Live Templates
- classcomponent (Create the class with react component with necessary methods and state without redux)
- classcomponentwithredux (Create the class with react component with necessary methods and state with redux)
- storeWithThunk (Create store with Thunk for the redux)
- Flatlist (For UI)
- Image (For UI)
- ImageWithUri (For UI)
- Text (For UI)
- Model (For UI)
- TouchableOpacity (For UI)
- StyleSheet

Show details in Preferences -> Editor -> Live Templates -> MILiveTemplate
